verses.name: Jeremiah 9:4
verses.text: Take ye heed every one of his neighbour, and trust ye not in any brother: for every brother will utterly supplant, and every neighbour will walk with slanders.

verses.name: Jeremiah 9:5
verses.text: And they will deceive every one his neighbour, and will not speak the truth: they have taught their tongue to speak lies, and weary themselves to commit iniquity.

verses.name: Jeremiah 9:6
verses.text: Thine habitation is in the midst of deceit; through deceit they refuse to know me, saith the Lord.

verses.name: Jeremiah 9:7
verses.text: Therefore thus saith the Lord of hosts, Behold, I will melt them, and try them; for how shall I do for the daughter of my people?
